description: The October 2023 Security Update has been reported to fail installation on affected Windows client platforms. Specifically, devices may show initial progress during the update process but ultimately fail to complete installation, often accompanied by error code 8007000d, indicating 'invalid data'. This issue affects users on Windows 10 versions 22H2 and 21H2, as detailed in KB Article KB-5031356, and presents significant challenges for system administrators managing patch compliance.
